title: Precision aikido 2
creator_credit: Michael Field and Kiko Pty Ltd
brief_description: Precision Aikido 2 reviews and expands on Precision Aikido 1. Provides detailed “How to do it” instructions for Aikido’s first and second locking and pinning techniques (Ikkyo and Nikyo Omote and Ura Wazas), 28 variations in total. Includes demonstrations of techniques from all the other Aikido technical catagories. Ideal for students and instructors of Aikido. Please note: this program has an ongoing timer at the top of the screen.
